alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Perry, western Conway, northeastern Yell and Pope Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dover to Russellville to 7 miles southwest of Carden Bottoms. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Broomfield... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Jerusalem... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... Taral... Sequoya Park... Casa... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 74 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
